requirement_designation: Science, Nature and Technology with Lab
course_description: The relationship between sequence, structure, and function of macromolecules focusing on the practical aspects of macromolecular synthesis, structural and functional characterization, and degradation.
prerequisites: (CHEM 203L or CHEM_OX 203L or CHEM 203ZL as prerequisite) and (CHEM 204 or CHEM_OX 204 as co-requisite) or equivalent transfer credit.
